translation.ko: 나무 밑에 앉혀서 술 깨우느라 바빴거든

translation.en: Oh, but I saw that guy. He took my airport van to the pub.
translation.ko: 저도 그 사람 봤어요 제 공항 밴을 타고 술집에 가던데

translation.en: [man 2 chuckling] That sounds about right.
I've been calling everywhere. No one has any workers to spare.
Not even a bloody backpacker. Anyway, gotta get back to the sheep.
translation.ko: 하다못해 배낭 여행객도 없답니다 아무튼 난 헛간에 있을게요

translation.en: Righto.
Let's get you situated, right?
[man] Hey. Stop.
Hi. Hi. Lola Alvarez.
I am very excited about your wine, Ms. Vaughn.
translation.ko: 본 씨의 와인을 많이 기대하고 있습니다

translation.en: And since you're only considering American importers personally,
translation.ko: 미국 수입사를 직접 찾고 계신다 들었는데

translation.en: I figured a self-made lady boss would appreciate another self-made lady boss--
translation.ko: 자수성가한 여성 사업가라면 같은 여성 사업가끼리…

translation.en: -Sorry, Hazel. She's-- -Not done talking.
My company, Salud Imports, is a newly established California importer--
translation.ko: 살루드 수입은 제가 새로 설립한 업체로…

translation.en: I've never heard of them. How new?
translation.ko: 한 번도 못 들어 봤는데요 얼마나 됐죠?

translation.en: So far, it's only me. and I'm still in the process of getting licensed.
translation.ko: 아직 직원은 저뿐이지만 주류 수입 면허도 신청했습니다

translation.en: -Doesn't that take months? -[Lola] 60 days.
And I can also guarantee placement with the world-famous chef Hamish King.
translation.ko: 또한 유명 셰프 해미쉬 킹 씨와도 연결해 드릴 수 있습니다

translation.en: Whoa. Let me stop you right there. Despite the ambush, I admire your moxie.
translation.ko: 거기까지, 당황스럽긴 해도 그 용기는 높이 사죠

translation.en: And Hamish King is an impressive name-drop, so I'll be just as straight with you in return.
You've clearly done your research.
Vaughn Family Wines is my baby,
translation.ko: 본 패밀리 와인은 내가 굉장히 아끼는 브랜드라

translation.en: so there is absolutely no way I will go with a first-time importer.
translation.ko: 본 패밀리 와인은 내가 굉장히 아끼는 브랜드라 신생 업체에 맡길 순 없어요 먼 길 왔는데 미안해요

translation.en: Sorry you wasted an airline flight.
translation.ko: 신생 업체에 맡길 순 없어요 먼 길 왔는데 미안해요

translation.en: Yeah, look, while I got ya, bad news. Jackaroo bailed on us today.
translation.ko: 나쁜 소식이 있는데 오늘 재커루가 도망갔어요

translation.en: -[Hazel] It's shearing season. -[man] Yeah. Same as neighboring stations.
translation.ko: - 양털 깎는 시즌이잖아 - 그건 다른 목장도 마찬가지죠

translation.en: -Everyone's shorthanded. -Well, I… I could do it.
Could do what?
The job. I mean, how long do you need someone? A few days?
About two weeks. Also, no.
Well, why not? I'm here and I'm willing. I can be your jackaroo.
translation.ko: 왜요? 전 여기서 묵잖아요 재커루도 할 수 있어요

translation.en: Yeah, nah. You'd, uh… you'd be a jillaroo. Gendered terms. Cute. Whatever works.
Look, we need someone with real station experience,
translation.ko: 우리는 진짜 목장 경험이 있는 일꾼이 필요해요

translation.en: not an Airbnb tourist.
Look, I came all this way to show Ms. Vaughn I go the extra mile.
translation.ko: 전 본 씨를 위해 여기까지 왔는데 더한 것도 할 수 있어요

translation.en: This is the extra mile.
I'm a hard worker. And I will hit the ground running,
just as I will when I'm working with your wine.
translation.ko: 본 씨의 와인 수입을 맡았다는 마음으로요

translation.en: Well, a pair of hands is a pair of hands. If Max here agrees.
translation.ko: 뭐, 없는 것보다 낫겠죠 맥스만 동의한다면요

translation.en: He's this station's boss cocky, so what he says, goes.
translation.ko: 이쪽이 목장 주인이라서 이 사람 말이 곧 법이죠

translation.en: You will never have to send me off to sober up under a tree.
translation.ko: 나무 밑에 앉혀서 술 깨울 일은 없을 거예요

translation.en: I pay attention.
[scoffing] I can't believe it's come to this. -[Hazel] Looks like your lucky day. -[grunts happily]
translation.ko: - 살다 보니 이런 날도 있네 - 운이 좋네요

translation.en: And since my sabbatical always includes endless work calls,
translation.ko: 전 안식기에도 업무 연락이 끊이질 않아서

translation.en: Max here will be in charge of training you starting today.
Today? No. I can't spend the next two weeks babysitting some newbie.
translation.ko: 오늘부터요? 다음 2주 동안은 신입을 봐줄 여유 없어요

translation.en: [Hazel] That's busy farm life for you.
-Yeah, Tim can do it. -The person I trust is you.
translation.ko: - 팀한테 시켜요 - 믿는 사람에게 맡기고 싶어

translation.en: I hope you're worth the trouble. Lola Alvarez, give us all you've got.
translation.ko: - 고생한 보람이 있으면 좋겠네요 - 롤라 앨버레즈 씨, 기대할게요

translation.en: If you pass muster at mustering, then we can talk wine.
translation.ko: 양 떼를 몰 줄 알게 되면 그때 와인 얘기를 해 보죠

translation.en: Deal. Thank you.
[whispering] Yes.
Might as well get started then.
-Wait, like, right now? -No time like the present.
Well, I mean, Don't I need to drop my bag off at the cottage first?
Leave it. And no more cottage. Workers stay in the shearers' quarters.
translation.ko: 아무 데나 둬요 또 일꾼들은 전용 숙소가 있어요

translation.en: Well, I… I mean, I can't just leave my bag here. What if it gets stolen?
We're 200 kilometers away from anything. Who's gonna steal it?
translation.ko: 근방 200km에 아무것도 없는데 누가 훔쳐 가겠어요?

translation.en: Wait. What? Uh…
[Max] Sheep pens. Shearing shed.
translation.ko: 여긴 양 우리, 저긴 털 깎는 헛간

translation.en: When you're running livestock, you wanna make sure they're safe,
translation.ko: 가축을 키울 땐 항상 안전한지 확인하고

translation.en: fed, you know, watered. Keep up on diseases and pregnancies.
translation.ko: 먹이와 물도 챙겨야 해요 질병과 임신 여부도 확인하고요

translation.en: Sounds like things get pretty wild here on a Saturday night.
translation.ko: 양들이 토요일 밤마다 난잡하게 노나 봐요

translation.en: Yeah.
[Max] Uh, so, during the season, we shear about 500 sheep a day.
translation.ko: 시즌 한창때는 하루에 양 500마리 분량의 털을 깎아요

translation.en: Ah. Okay. So that's where the action happens. Uh, yeah, nah.
You won't be doing any sheep work. That's for the experienced hands.
translation.ko: 양털을 깎을 일은 없을 거예요 숙련자만 가능하거든요

translation.en: Okay. So, what will I be doing?
Chores. Grunt work. Hard yakka.
Hey, you volunteered for it.
Not complaining. I love grunt work.
Whoo! Bring it on. That's good to hear.
We'll start you off with some fence mending.
We have kangaroos out here, constantly making holes.
Kangaroos? Like, boing-boing ones with pouches? Will I get to see some?
translation.ko: 주머니 달고 폴짝거리는 캥거루요? 저도 볼 수 있나요?

translation.en: Yeah. That "boing-boing one" will kick you flat on your back.
translation.ko: 그 폴짝거리는 친구한테 차이면 골로 가요

translation.en: What about koalas?
Uh, they scratch.
Huge claws, like this.
Oh. So disappointing. Do you have to burst every bubble?
translation.ko: 김새네요 꼭 그렇게 찬물을 끼얹어야 해요?

translation.en: -[engine sputtering] -[Max] Maybe.
[Max] Hey, don't-- Lazza, don't.
-Lazza, don't keep-- -[Lola] Oh. [chuckles]
[groaning] Lazza, don't quit on me here. Come on.
Busted radiator. Gotta walk back. Wait. Can't you call a tow truck?
translation.ko: - 방열기가 나가서 걸어가야 해요 - 견인차를 부르면 되잖아요

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, nah. There's no reception out here.
Oh, great. [scoffing] Station life is unpredictable.
As they say, "If you jump in the saddle, be ready for the ride."
translation.ko: 안장에 올라타면 말을 탈 준비를 하라는 말이 있죠

translation.en: -Was that a cowboy wisdom quote? -Stockman. No cowboys here.
Then what's a jackaroo?
Well, it's technically a cowboy, but it's a term for newbies like you.
translation.ko: 말하자면 목동 같은 건데 당신 같은 신입을 뜻하죠

translation.en: -Are they all you got? -My ankle boots?
-Oh, I have sneakers too. -Oh, that's no good.
-Flip-flops? -It's rough land out here.
You'll need Blunnies to protect your feet. And you didn't even bring a hat.
translation.ko: 발을 보호하려면 가죽 장화가 필요한데 모자도 없잖아요

translation.en: It was kinda supposed to be a two-night stay.
-Right. -You guys got a gift shop? [chuckling] That's very funny.
-Here. Take mine. [laughing] -Oh! No, no, no.
Okay. Oh, right.
Well, then, thank you. This is… This is fine. I'm fine.
[Max] Well, you won't be in an hour or so. Australian sun shows no mercy.
translation.ko: 한 시간만 있어 봐요 호주 햇볕은 장난 아니거든요

translation.en: We'll start back training tomorrow.
[Lola] What?
[Max] Sixty days, huh?
-[Lola] To get my wine importer's license? -[Max] I pay attention.
Yeah. There's no way Hazel's gonna go for a company that doesn't exist yet.
translation.ko: 헤이즐이 면허도 없는 회사에게 맡길 리가 없잖아요

translation.en: You do realize how absurd that is, right?
translation.ko: 말도 안 되는 소리인 거 알죠?

translation.en: Well, sometimes you have to take risks. Believe in yourself.
translation.ko: 가끔은 위험을 감수해야 해요 자신을 믿어야죠

translation.en: You know, go big or go home.
Yeah. Well, good on ya. But I wouldn't get my hopes up.
translation.ko: 좋은 자세네요 하지만 너무 기대는 말아요

translation.en: Okay. Well, thank you for the encouragement.
I'm just being practical.
Practical isn't really my style.
Is it always so hot here?
Nah. Gets heaps hotter in the arvo.
-Arvo? -[Max] Means "afternoon."
[woman] Who's the one who lives in the van?
[woman 2] No. The blonde one from last Saturday.
translation.ko: 아니, 지난 토요일에 봤던 그 금발 말이야

translation.en: [woman 2] He's the only shaggable man within 200 kilometers.
translation.ko: 근방 200km 안에서 잘 수 있는 유일한 남자지

translation.en: [woman] This is why I'm glad I'm not single.
translation.ko: 근방 200km 안에서 잘 수 있는 유일한 남자지 안녕하세요 LA에서 온 롤라라고 해요

translation.en: Hi. Lola from L.A.
Your new roomie. [chuckling]
Hi.
Oh, impromptu mobile office.
I got a Skype-date with Heidi.
Yeah. Lockie hasn't messaged me back since Tuesday.
translation.ko: 화요일 이후로 로키가 답장을 안 했거든

translation.en: He's definitely ghosting me.
Ugh, men.
I'm Breeze. And don't worry about them.
translation.ko: 브리즈라고 해요 저 둘은 신경 쓰지 마세요

translation.en: Takes a while to earn their trust.
Oh. Yeah, I'm only here for two weeks. I'm not trying to steal their jobs, so…
translation.ko: 난 2주만 있을 거라서요 일자리 뺏을 생각은 없어요

translation.en: Reckon that airport van'll be back here in no time.
Bet you ten bucks she doesn't last the week.
-[chuckles] Deal. -[shower knob squeaks]
sitting right here. Just--
[man] Oh no! Somebody used all the hot water!
translation.ko: 이런! 누가 뜨거운 물을 다 썼어?

translation.en: -What? Are you kidding? -Are you serious?
Sorry. It was a 14-hour flight. I really needed that long shower.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 14시간 비행이라 샤워를 좀 오래 했어요

translation.en: -[scoffing] -Heidi. Hi, baby.
Hey. How you going?
[woman 2] I'm good. Tired. You look amazing.
translation.ko: 난 잘 있지, 피곤하네 자기는 오늘도 예뻐

translation.en: -[woman 2] No… -[woman] Oh, come on.
Well, that is just brilliant.
Sorry.
Chores don't do themselves, Big Smoke.
[man] Here you go, Henry.
Today's riddle.
Oh, not this again. Every damn morning.
Gotta keep you on your toes.
What ship has two mates but no captain?
translation.ko: 선원이 두 명인데 선장은 없는 함선은?

translation.en: -[woman] Like a canoe? -[Henry] Nah.
No, like a kayak with, like, two seats.
Oh, thank you.
-[woman] Titanic. -[Henry] That doesn't even make sense.
-[Lola groans] -[woman 2] A submarine?
Sorry, sir? Excuse me,
do you have any other coffee options, like a latte or an espresso?
translation.ko: 다른 커피는 없나요? 라테나 에스프레소 같은 거요

translation.en: You're joking. Right?
Okay. I can work with this. No worries.
translation.ko: 제가 어떻게든 마셔 볼게요 신경 쓰지 마세요

translation.en: Oi, over here. We saved you a seat.
You guys are, uh, talking to me now?
Uh, well, Breeze was right. We can be a bit too hard on the newbies.
translation.ko: 브리즈 말이 맞긴 해요 우리가 신참에겐 좀 매정하죠

translation.en: Yeah. We were just pulling your leg last night, that's all.
Okay. [scoffing]
-Hi. -Hi. Morning.
Oh, don't. You two are terrible. Leave her alone, the poor thing.
translation.ko: 너희도 정말 너무하다 불쌍하게 왜 괴롭혀?

translation.en: -Best prank ever. -It never gets old. [laughing]
translation.ko: - 지금까지 중 반응 최고다 - 매번 재밌네

translation.en: Bit of a friendly hazing. Should've warned ya.
translation.ko: 저래도 악의는 없어요 미리 경고할 걸 그랬네요

translation.en: -We all get it on our first day. -Yeah. Female friendship is overrated.
translation.ko: - 첫날에는 다 당해요 - 여자들의 우정은 개뿔

translation.en: I got it! The riddle. A relationship.
Yeah. We have a winner. -Oh. -Oh.
[Henry] First prize, an extra snag from Danno here.
translation.ko: 일등에겐 다노가 소시지를 하나 더 줄 거야

translation.en: -[woman] I'm getting it tonight. -Morning.
-[Henry] Hey, boss. -[all] Morning.
-You ready to get started? -Yeah, let's do it.
[Max] Right, so you bend this. Like that.
[Lola] Okay.
Feed this through here, right? Then you twist it. You twist that back.
translation.ko: 이 안으로 넣고 이렇게 꺾은 다음 한 번 더 꺾어요

translation.en: Then you twist that back through there, and then you… Right, okay.
-Like that. See? -[Lola] Yeah.
-So you hold this and pull down. -[Lola] Uh-huh.
-And that's it. Done. -Oh.
Show me again.
-Seriously? -Just-- Last time, I swear.
This is the one.
A week ago, I was pouring a Cabernet for the sommelier at the Ritz-Carlton.
translation.ko: 일주일 전엔 리츠칼튼의 소믈리에에게 카베르네를 대접하고

translation.en: And now, I'm pouring sheep food. What happened?
translation.ko: 오늘은 양에게 사료를 대접하네 어쩌다 이렇게 됐지?

translation.en: Oh. Hey, girl. Somebody looks hungry. You ready to eat?
translation.ko: 안녕, 배고픈 모양이구나 밥 먹을 준비 됐니?

translation.en: [Lola] Okay, then.
You got it easy, sister. Waited on hand and hoof.
translation.ko: 넌 좋겠다 이렇게 떠먹여 주는 사람도 있고

translation.en: Bon appétit, whoever you are.
Wait. Who are you? You need a name.
translation.ko: 그러고 보니 넌 누구니? 이름을 지어 줘야겠네

translation.en: Come on.
Oh! No, no, no, no! Stop. Stop it. Don't do that!
Just spitballing here. Uh, Meryl Sheep?
Just-- That's it! Don't--
Uh, Calista Flockhart?
-Yup. Good boy. -[sheep bleating] Okay.
-Hey. You're mixing up the mob. -What?
You see the different colored tags here?
You better get to re-sorting the sheep. They're not gonna sort themselves.
translation.ko: 양들이 알아서 무리를 나누진 않을 테니 어서 분류해요

translation.en: Yeah, okay. All right. Listen up, guys, okay? No mingling.
translation.ko: 알겠어요, 얘들아 서로 섞여 있으면 안 돼

translation.en: Hey! Hello? Hello?
Pay attention. No, no, no.
Wait, hey, do you have wool in your ears? What the flock.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 귓속까지 양털이 찬 거야? 진짜 너무하네

translation.en: No. I've got it.
You are a grand dame.
A diva.
You are Baaabra Streisand.
I like you.
Move it. Move… Thank you.
Stay. Stay. Okay.
Wait, no.
Okay.
cool.
Your boots are amazing. [chuckling] I should've consulted you before I packed.
translation.ko: 부츠가 참 멋지네요 짐 쌀 때 상의할 걸 그랬어요

translation.en: -Um, speaking of… -[Hazel] Mm-hmm.
…on the plane I read in Wine Spectator that you like unique wines.
translation.ko: 그나저나 비행기에서 '와인 스펙터'를 읽었는데 독특한 와인을 좋아하신다면서요? 그런데 그거 아세요?

translation.en: And there's this all-female collective out of Uruguay doing amazing stuff.
translation.ko: 독특한 와인을 좋아하신다면서요? 그런데 그거 아세요? 저희 우루과이 출신 여성들이 아주 좋은 와인을 만들거든요

translation.en: I could, uh… I could arrange for them to send you some bottles.
translation.ko: 저희 우루과이 출신 여성들이 아주 좋은 와인을 만들거든요 원하시면 몇 병 보내 드릴게요

translation.en: I'm busy with station work.
You should be too.
-[Lola] Why is this so hard? -[Max] Yeah. Well, station life is tough.
translation.ko: - 왜 되는 일이 없죠? - 목장 일이 원래 어려워요

translation.en: Can't wine and dine your way out of problems.
Oh, that's what you think I do all day?
Well, isn't it?
Well, technically, yes. -Huh. -[Lola] But I'm a self-starter.
translation.ko: 엄밀히 따지면 맞는데 난 할 일을 찾아서 한다고요

translation.en: Number one at Girl Scout cookie sales three years in a row.
High school valedictorian.
Nailed my sommelier exam at age 22, which is basically unheard of.
And I do the New York Times crossword puzzle in ink.
translation.ko: 게다가 난 '뉴욕 타임스' 십자말풀이를 펜으로 푼다고요

translation.en: I do not fail. I've got this.
translation.ko: 내 사전에 실패는 없어요 두고 봐요

translation.en: Well, a stubborn horse walks ahead of the herd.
translation.ko: 고집 센 말이 무리를 앞서 나가죠

translation.en: Where do you get these quotes? Pinterest?
-Hey, hey! Stop! Stop! -No. I'll fix it.
I just need to get the plow!
-Brown snake! It's a brown snake. -[tense music playing]
Extremely deadly.
Okay.
-[Max clearing throat] -Well, uh… [Max] Oh, you leave 'em be, they'll leave you be.
translation.ko: - 그럼 어쩌죠? - 내버려 두면 안 공격해요

translation.en: Getting closer and closer.
-Can you believe it? -[woman] Yeah, can't wait.
I'm so excited.
Love you, Heidi. Take care of our bean.
translation.ko: 사랑해, 하이디 우리 콩알 잘 돌봐 줘

translation.en: Sam's partner Heidi is up the duff. Like Hilary?
translation.ko: - 하이디 배가 잔뜩 불렀대요 - 뭘 그렇게 먹었대요?

translation.en: Like pregnant. Due next month.
Ah. What? Congratulations. [Sam] Yeah.
-Campfire time. Oi. -[people laughing]
-Hmm? Yes. -[Sam] Let's get some coldies.
translation.ko: - 시원한 맥주 사러 가자 - 그래, 브리즈도 와

translation.en: -Breeze. -Yeah, coming.
Oi, newbie. I noticed the dunny's looking pretty scungy. So…
translation.ko: 어이, 신참 아까 보니까 화장실이 더럽던데

translation.en: Sorry, I should've warned ya, again. Newest jillaroo gets toilet-cleaning duty.

translation.en: And so, we repurpose sheep manure into fertilizer.
It's all part of keeping Waratah green.
Okay. The, uh, eco-friendly aspect of this farm got a lot less appealing.

translation.en: Yeah. So shovel that into the spreader.
We're gonna need 20 loads today. Twen--? Oh… Yeah.
No.
Oh, that was terrible.
Nope, nothing. Okay.
[Hazel] How's it going with the American?
Uh, she has spirit, I'll say that.
Translation, she's useless?
Well, uh…
Hi there. Hi. Here I am. Hard at work. Whoa!
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 저 여깄어요 열심히 일하고 있답니다

translation.en: Oh no, no, no, no, no, no.
No, no, no.
I, uh… I saw this whole thing going differently.
translation.ko: 의도한 건 아닌데 일이 이렇게 되어 버렸네요

translation.en: Haze, you all right? Wait, no. Wait, I'm sorry.
Uh, wait, wait. No, I'm sorry.
Where are you going in such a rush? L.A. Tell Sam she won the bet.
translation.ko: - 어디를 그렇게 급하게 가요? - LA요, 샘이 이겼다고 전해요

translation.en: -[Lola straining] -Come on, Lola. Don't go. It's been five days. It took me months to find my groove here.
translation.ko: 닷새 만에 포기하지 말아요 나도 적응하는 데 몇 달 걸렸어요

translation.en: I don't have months. This was always a pipe dream.

translation.en: There's no way I am recovering from today. Any tips on how to hail a taxi?
translation.ko: 오늘 일은 절대 수습할 수 없어요 택시 잘 잡는 비법이나 알려 줘요

translation.en: Nah, they take forever and cost a fortune.
translation.ko: 없어요, 잘 안 잡히고 돈도 많이 받거든요

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Max is heading into town though. Yay.
Hey, Arlo.
Can I hitch a ride?
Yep.
[Max] Ugh. Lazza, you rotten old bastard.
[Lola sighing] Seriously? Again?
[Max sighing] I'll motorbike back from the station with tools. Let's go.
translation.ko: 목장에서 공구를 가지고 오토바이로 다시 오죠

translation.en: -[Max] Arlo! Come here. -[Lola] Dressed for success, as always.
translation.ko: - 알로! 이리 와 - 오늘도 의상 끝내주네

translation.en: You know what? I think this is a sign. Australia hates me!
translation.ko: 이건 신호가 분명해요 호주는 날 싫어해요!

translation.en: Hate's a pretty strong word.
You know, I've never quit anything. Ever.
Never mind bold and crazy, I went too big and now I'm going home.

translation.en: Hey, where's that spitfire who blew in,
determined to do business with the Hazel Vaughn, huh? She was gutsy.
translation.ko: 헤이즐 본과 사업하겠다는 그 불도저는 어디 갔죠?

translation.en: [in Australian accent] Time for her to pack it in, mate.
[Max chuckling] I don't know.
It's not every day a Fortune 500 CEO gets sheep dung sprayed all over 'em.
translation.ko: 포춘지 선정 500대 기업 CEO가 언제 양 똥 범벅이 돼 보겠어요?

translation.en: That really cracked me up. [scoffing] Well, I'm glad that I could amuse you.
Wait a second. Was that a smile just then?
Oh, come on. You're halfway there.
No. I see what you're doing and I will not fall for it, pal. Okay?
-Let me wallow in self-pity. -See, now you're talking.
translation.ko: - 자기 연민에 빠질 시간을 줘요 - 그렇죠

translation.en: You just gotta get one side of your mouth up and then the other side--
-And then you got a full smile. -Stop. Stop! You are a horrible man.
translation.ko: - 그만해요, 이 나쁜 사람 - 나머지를 올리면 완성!

translation.en: I know. I know. It's one of my better qualities.
I, uh, heard you talking to Hazel before.
You were about to agree with her that I am useless.
Uh, I was about to tell Hazel that you have promise. Because you do.
translation.ko: 대표님에게 약속을 잊지 말라고 말하려 했어요

translation.en: You know, when it comes to the hard work,
translation.ko: 고된 일을 해야 하는 상황이 오면

translation.en: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses,
translation.ko: 누구는 소매를 걷어붙이고 누구는 콧방귀를 뀌고

translation.en: and some don't turn up at all.
You really do have a thing for inspirational quotes, don't you?
You turned up, Lola, and you didn't turn up your nose.
translation.ko: 당신은 자리에 나타났잖아요 콧방귀를 뀌지도 않았고요

translation.en: That's worth a lot in my book. And Hazel's too.
Wait. You told me not to get my hopes up when it comes to Hazel.
I dunno. Maybe…
Maybe you're onto something about taking risks.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 당신은 위험 감수가 잘 맞는 성격인가 봐요

translation.en: Look, it's not like you'll make your flight now,
translation.ko: 어차피 오늘 안에 비행기 타는 건 무리니까

translation.en: -so just think on it overnight. -[sighs]
[Lola scoffing] Okay, what now?
[Max] Uh, nothing. I'm just curious.
Why wine?
My, uh… My dad worked his butt off to support the two of us.
translation.ko: 아빠는 우리 둘을 부양하느라 힘들게 일하셨어요

translation.en: He went from selling insurance door-to-door to setting up his own shop.
translation.ko: 보험 외판원을 하시다가 나중엔 직접 가게를 차리셨죠

translation.en: He was the OG badass.
My mom was never really in the picture,
so, you know, my dad's my hero and role model,
and I just figured I'd follow him into the insurance biz.
translation.ko: 그래서 아빠를 따라 보험 일을 하려고 했었죠

translation.en: And then, in college, I was, um, I was waitressing at this upscale L.A. steakhouse,
translation.ko: 대학 시절, LA 고급 스테이크 하우스에서 일했는데

translation.en: and… and one night the Wine Captain didn't show up for his shift.
translation.ko: 대학 시절, LA 고급 스테이크 하우스에서 일했는데 어느 날, 소믈리에가 무단결근했어요

translation.en: So, I winged it and nailed it. [Max] Hmm.
translation.ko: 제가 기지를 발휘해서 위기를 무사히 넘겼고요

translation.en: I… I had a knack for telling a wine's story. The magical places it'll take you.
translation.ko: 와인을 소개하면서 그걸 마시면 떠오르는 광경을 잘 설명했나 봐요

translation.en: I'd found my thing.
That's a good feeling to have.
-I think he agrees. -Yeah, he likes that.
♪ And she woke up In a cold sweat on the floor ♪
♪ Next to a family portrait Drawn when you were four ♪
-[women groaning] -[Lola] Having a, uh, lie-in, ladies? Hmm?
I, uh, fixed the hot water issue. My dad's house has a tricky boiler too.
translation.ko: 온수 문제는 내가 해결했어요 아빠 집에서 많이 고쳐 봤거든요

translation.en: Dibs on the first shower. [gasping] You go, girl.
translation.ko: 내가 첫 번째로 씻을 거야 고마워요

translation.en: I reckon we're about the same size.
Yeah, and I've got a spare pair of Blunnies too, so…

translation.en: Thanks, but why?
You proved us wrong, mate. I lost the bet.
translation.ko: 우리가 틀렸다는 걸 증명했잖아요 내기는 내가 졌네요

translation.en: [chuckling] Welcome to the crew.
translation.ko: 정식 일원이 된 걸 환영해요 덕분에 돈도 벌고

translation.en: And thanks for putting a tenner in my pocket, making Kylie a loser.
translation.ko: 정식 일원이 된 걸 환영해요 덕분에 돈도 벌고 카일리도 이겼네요

translation.en: Yes, yes.
Anyway, the shoes are a loan,

translation.en: so I expect them back and in perfect condition too.
translation.ko: 신발은 빌려주는 거니까 나중에 꼭 돌려줘요 지금 상태 그대로요

translation.en: You got it.
They charge six dollars for this in L.A. It's called a pour-over.
-Six bucks? -[Lola] Mm-hmm. I gotta get a new job.
-Newsflash. -[Max] Mm-hmm. I'm staying.
So our efforts to run you off, they failed?
I did some light reading last night. Heard of her? Sybylla Vaughn?
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 잠깐 책을 읽었는데 시빌라 본이라고 들어 봤어요?

translation.en: -Uh, yeah. The name does ring a bell. -[Lola] Okay. I'll summarize.
Sybylla is the OG outback badass. She is a widow who blazed her own trail,
translation.ko: 시빌라는 과부의 몸으로 오지를 개척한 분이에요

translation.en: founding Waratah with nothing but grit and determination. She's a true pioneer.
translation.ko: 투지와 결의만으로 이 목장을 만든 진정한 선구자라고 할 수 있죠

translation.en: Like you?
Sybylla wasn't a quitter, and neither am I. Any questions?
translation.ko: 둘 다 포기를 모르는 성격인가 봐요, 질문 없나요?

translation.en: Uh, not really. Nah. I researched and edited the book myself, so…
translation.ko: 딱히 없네요, 내가 직접 조사하고 편집한 서적이라서요

translation.en: What? You couldn't interrupt my monologue with that vital information?
translation.ko: 뭐라고요? 그런 건 내가 주절대기 전에 말해 줘야죠

translation.en: No, it was too much fun to watch.
translation.ko: 그런 재밌는 장면을 놓칠 순 없죠

Mysterious box.
Sybylla would believe a proper jillaroo, which you are now, deserves a proper hat.

translation.en: Also, I really need my favorite back. You already knew I was staying?
translation.ko: - 내가 아끼는 모자는 돌려줘요 - 내가 남을 걸 알았어요?

translation.en: Uh, no one can resist the wisdom of my inspirational quotes.
translation.ko: 영감을 주는 인용구를 그렇게 들려줬는데 떠나겠어요?

translation.en: -Admit it, you get 'em on Pinterest. -That's highly classified information.
translation.ko: - 핀터레스트에서 본 거 맞죠? - 출처는 비밀이에요

translation.en: Ooh. A man never reveals his secrets.
-Audra! -Yes?
Why is every single one of our accounts in trouble?
translation.ko: 왜 고객 관리가 전혀 안 되고 있지?

translation.en: Oh, um, maybe the workplace culture thing? Drive to Laguna now and fix this.
translation.ko: - 직장 문화 때문인가 봐요 - 당장 러구나에 가서 수습해

translation.en: Oh, Calder, I am on it.
-Well, get more on it! -Sorry.
translation.ko: - 바로 해결할게요 - 말만 하지 말고! - 죄송합니다 - 롤라였으면 이미 도착했어

translation.en: Lola would already be doing 80 on the 405.
Yes. Okay.
Go.
-[indistinct chatter and laughter] -[keyboard clacking]
Right, so, I was up before dawn,
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거냐면 동이 트기 전에 일어나서

translation.en: and I'm shoveling out a shed full of sheep manure,
and, uh, someone jumps in the shed and starts shoveling next to me.
translation.ko: 누군가 들어오더니 내 옆에서 삽질을 시작하더라

translation.en: Uh, it's so dark, I couldn't see who they were.
Anyway, we finished the job, step outside,
and then as the sun's coming up, in the dawn light, I can see it's a woman.
translation.ko: 마침 동이 트면서 햇빛이 비치는데 여자인 거야

translation.en: And then it just hits me, hey.
Like, yeah.
I think I'm in love.
Are you not chained to your lappie tonight?
Oh. Well, with all this merriment going on, I mean, how's a girl to concentrate?
translation.ko: 다들 이렇게 재밌게 노는데 집중이 되겠어요?

translation.en: [Max] Stubbie?
I'm actually more of a, uh, Bordeaux Blanc type.
Ah, served chilled around eight degrees Celsius.
-Mm. -Yeah. Nah, we're fresh out. Oh, look at that. Someone knows wine.
translation.ko: - 안타깝지만 그건 없네요 - 누가 와인 공부 좀 했네요

translation.en: What the heck. When in Rome. Or, you know, the middle of nowhere.
So, the, uh, boss cocky has hidden talents? I've heard you. You're not bad.
translation.ko: 목장주에게 취미가 있다면서요? 들어 보니 나쁘지 않던데요

translation.en: Go on. Keep going.
[Max] Almost.
[Lola] But now we're back.
-That's true. -[all chuckling]
Everybody!
Louder!
Okay, slow it down.
-[all] Yeah! -[Lola] That was so good!
-[indistinct chatter] -[Max] Good job.
[Sam] Okay, Big Smoke!
[Max] Not bad.
Come on.
Stop. Keep going.
What exactly is Vegemite?
Leftover brewer's yeast.
Oh. Seriously?
-[Henry] Yeah. -[Lola] Hmm.
So interesting. Hey, look, what's going on over there?
-What? -[Lola] I think Max needs you.
-He's all right. -So Henry, tell me.
translation.ko: - 괜찮은 것 같은데 - 그나저나 헨리, 말해 봐

translation.en: Why the life of a shearer?
I like the freedom.
You know, you're always moving around, you work with the same mates job to job.
translation.ko: 항상 돌아다니면서 일하고 동료들이 거기서 거기잖아

translation.en: Look, I can shear hard for a couple months and have time off, family, go fishing.
translation.ko: 몇 달만 열심히 일하면 나머지는 편히 쉴 수도 있고

translation.en: Just take it easy, you know? It's not like one of them office jobs
where you go chuck a sickie for a day off.
Work-life balance. Huh. I always thought that was an urban legend.
translation.ko: 워라밸 말이지? 도시 전설인 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Maybe you'll learn it here. Yeah, maybe.
-[wondrous music playing] -I'm trying.
-[sheep bleating] -[Lola] Baaabra sends her love.
And I won't bother asking what book you're discussing tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘은 무슨 책을 읽고 토론했는지 안 물을게요

translation.en: John and Diane only show up for gossip on this Max guy.
translation.ko: 존과 다이앤은 맥스 얘기 들으러 온 거야

translation.en: Tell us everything.
Spare no details.
Did you get it, girl?
Okay. Great talking to you, guys. Love you. Bye.
[Carlos] Oy, does he have a six pack?
-[Max] Hey. -Hi.
So, uh, Sam had to go to the doctor with Heidi,
which means you're finally going to do sheep work today in the shearing shed.
translation.ko: 드디어 양털 깎는 헛간에서 일해 볼 수 있겠네요

translation.en: Wait, I'm sorry. Did… did I just get a promotion?
[laughing] Well, you can call it that if you like. Yes! Amazing.
translation.ko: - 그렇게 볼 수 있겠네요 - 좋아요! 잘됐네요

translation.en: Okay. Is Hazel gonna be around today too?
Get to see my promotion in action?
Uh, no. She went to Sydney overnight to visit her boyfriend.
translation.ko: 아니요, 남자 친구 만나러 어제 시드니에 갔어요

translation.en: So, what is your deal with Hazel?
It's… it's complicated.
Okay. Let's go.
Okay. Uh, let me just give Baaabra some water first.
Uh, Who-bra?
Oh. Baaabra. I, uh… I named her. [chuckles]
Lola, it's a big mistake. You never name 'em.
translation.ko: 롤라, 그러면 안 돼요 가축에 이름 붙이지 말아요

translation.en: -Well, you named your truck Lazza. -Yeah. It means Larry.
translation.ko: - 당신 트럭 이름은 라자잖아요 - 네, 래리라는 뜻이죠

translation.en: You know, Larry's a solid bloke. He's… [chuckling] …he's a reliable mate.
I mean, is he really that reliable? And why is Baaabra stuck in solitary?
translation.ko: 그다지 본분을 다하진 않던데요 그런데 얘는 왜 독방 신세죠?

translation.en: Uh, she's CFA. Cast for age.
She's, uh…
She's dinner next Sunday.
What? No!
No, no, no. We're… We're great friends. She gives great advice. She's deeply wise.
translation.ko: 우린 좋은 친구란 말이에요 내게 조언도 하는 똑똑한 아이예요

translation.en: It's just the way it is with old-timers.
Hey. Don't worry, Baaabs. I will spring you from Death Row. I promise.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 메에에릴 내가 널 지켜 줄게

translation.en: Ducks on the pond!
-Oh? -It's an old-school saying.
It means there's a lady coming into the shed.
[Kylie] Hey. That's no lady.
That's our Lola.
She'll show you what to do.
-Okay. Got it. -Go have fun. Go.
Lola, grab us another fleece.
translation.ko: 롤라, 양털 한 뭉치 더 가져와

translation.en: -Okay, uh… -[Kylie] Now! Run!
-Like now? -[Kylie] Right now! Go!
-Okay. I'm… Okay. I'm gonna go this way. -[Kylie] Let's go!
[Kylie] Pick up the pace, Lola.
Here we go. Now let the fleece fly. Let it go from the bottom, flick it out.
translation.ko: 자, 이제 양털을 던져 봐 밑에서부터 펼치면 돼

translation.en: Yeah, nah, that's not it. But that's all right.
[Lola] No.
Now! Run! Now! Right now!
You gotta flick it out.
-Yeah. That's a little better. -Really?
Yeah. You're getting better. That's good. -Okay. -That's good.
Since Lola quit Mythos, I'm overseeing your account now.
translation.ko: 롤라가 미토스를 그만둬서 제가 관리를 인계받았습니다

translation.en: I can offer you a multi-case discount on Spotted Duck Merlot.
translation.ko: 스포티드 덕 메를로를 대량 구매하시면 할인해 드릴게요

translation.en: I don't do wines with animals as their logo.
translation.ko: 로고에 동물이 있는 와인은 취급 안 해요

translation.en: -Or Merlot. -Oh. Uh, I could offer you a Syrah--
I'll wait for Lola to get back from Australia
translation.ko: 일단은 롤라가 호주에서 돌아올 때까지 기다릴게요

translation.en: and see what her new company has to offer.
translation.ko: 그쪽 회사의 제안도 들어 보고 싶어서요

translation.en: Australia?
Hello? I'm sorry. Nail art happening here. Don't make me start over.
translation.ko: 저기요, 네일 아트 중이잖아 처음부터 다시 하기 싫어

translation.en: The last time I shag a bartender. You know, he's definitely ghosting me.
translation.ko: 저번에 바텐더랑 잤거든? 그 후로 잠수 타는 게 분명해

translation.en: Oh, hell no, sister. No bartenders. Trust me. I'm divorced from one.
translation.ko: 바텐더는 절대 안 돼, 날 믿어 내가 바텐더랑 이혼했거든

translation.en: Okay, spill, sister.
-Oh. It's not very juicy. -[Kylie] Go on.
Okay. I… I got married when I was young. He was handsome. I was in love.

No chemicals, no manipulations,

-So, my specialty is blends. -[Lola] Hmm.
Vaughn Family Wines have really unique flavor profiles found nowhere else.

It's like I'm in a rustic mountain cabin,

Citrus and mineral.
Ooh. Sign me up for that. It's 200 dollars a bottle.

translation.en: -I'll pack you some wine to-go. -Cool, thanks.

translation.en: So, how does this work? I mean, you're obviously a regular here.

-Yikes. -[Max] Mm-hmm.
I guess, uh… [inhales deeply] in vino veritas?
Boozy truth?

translation.en: It's hot, remote, dangerous.
[scoffing] It is not for the faint of heart.
Yeah, but rugged loner is just a way of making excuses for myself.

translation.en: Unlike someone I know.

-[Max sighing] A juvenile. -[Lola] Baby kangaroo.

-[Lola] Yes, you did. -Nope.
Remember the other day?
-[Max] I don't, 'cause it didn't happen. -You said it. Better make it happen.

Australia showing off again.

-[Lola] I was inspired by our field trip. -[Max] Hmm. I have new ideas to pitch to Hazel.

Yep. A new label. Every bottle should tell her story.

Sybylla is what makes Vaughn Family Wines.
She's the key. I mean, she can create a personal relationship
between the winemaker and the wine drinker.
Sybylla is an aspirational inspiration to all.
That's a really great idea.
I've been feeling really creative.
[sighing] I think it's from my time here at Waratah Station.
-I don't know how to put it, but-- -It's revived your senses, maybe?
translation.ko: - 설명하긴 어려운데… - 감각이 되살아난 게 아닐까요?

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah. [chuckling]
[chuckling] Exactly.
Air smells fresher. Food tastes better. I sleep like a log.

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. Well, I can drink to that.
Wait, is that the… is that the 200-dollar bottle of Chardonnay?

translation.en: Just say cheers.
Okay. Salud.
Yeah.
And we're also celebrating sparing your sheep. Blah Blah whatever its name is.

translation.en: -It won't be Sunday supper. Oh God. -Baaabra? -Yeah. It won't -Really?
Yeah, nah.
Was that more on the "yeah," or the "nah"? Or just a meaningless "yeah, nah"?
[laughs] Yeah, nah. You won me over. All right?

translation.en: -Can we put a cute scarf around her neck? -[Max] No.

Nah.

…but bed is calling my name.
[Max] Swag check.

There you go, buddy.
Okay.
-Wow. [chuckles nervously] -[Max] It's all good.
-Whatever you say. -Whatever I say.
Oh, okay. Hello?
-[Max] You all right? [laughs] -[laughing] Yeah.

That's Alpha Centauri there,
and, uh, that's the Southern Cross.
Hey. What if that snake comes back?

Lola, there's, uh…
there's something I need to tell you.
I should've told you a while ago it's… but it's not as big as--

Morning, boss cocky.
Uh, Lola. You need to know now.

-Sorry, what? -[Max] Max Vaughn.

I… I google-stalked Hazel before I came. I mean, a Fatal Attraction-level stalk--

translation.en: Yeah. I… I don't have social media,

translation.ko: 난 SNS 계정도 없고 인터넷에서 내 정보를 아예 지워 버렸어 돈만 있으면 얼마든지 가능해

translation.en: You can do that when you have heaps of money.

translation.en: -Wait, Hazel's money? -[Max] No, mine.
Hazel and I are business partners. I'm… I'm a silent investor.

translation.ko: 그 후 헤이즐의 첫 회사에 내가 투자했어

translation.en: I gave her the capital.
Listen, Lola. Hazel is my sister and I love her,

translation.ko: 순수하게 기회를 얻으려고 열심히 일한 거라고

translation.en: But you know what? What would you know about honesty?
Yeah. All right. Look, I deserve that. All right? The thing is, Lola, I just…

Okay, so all this time, sharing confidences…

translation.en: I'm the same person that you spent the last two weeks with, Lola.

translation.en: The same person that you kissed last night.
I was just trying to protect my heart.
Yeah. Well, I… I wish I'd done the same.
[Lola] You're right.

translation.en: Oh, there you are.
Lola, Hazel wants to see you right now up at the house.
-Now? -[Breeze] Now.
Okay.
[Hazel] That is a great idea.
[Calder] We'll make it happen.
[Hazel] That's good.
Oh, Lola. Calder was just telling me how you worked for him for years,

translation.en: and how devastated he was that you decided to strike out on your own.
translation.ko: 당신이 회사를 그만두고 나갈 때 콜더가 많이 힘들었대요

translation.en: It's why I came all this way. To hire you back.
translation.ko: 그래서 여기까지 온 거야 널 다시 채용하려고

translation.en: Wait, what? I thought--
I'm impressed by the lengths you went to to get this account.
translation.ko: 고객 확보를 위해 여기까지 온 네 열정에 감명받았어

translation.en: Lola's being promoted to National Sales Director.
She'll be handling your account. Vaughn Family Wines was all her idea.
translation.ko: 이제 본 와인은 롤라 담당입니다 처음부터 롤라 생각이었거든요

translation.en: The timing is perfect.
Calder, Lola can take you and Audra to visit the winery,
translation.ko: 롤라가 두 분에게 양조장을 보여 주세요

translation.en: and I'll have my Sydney office draw up the contracts.
translation.ko: 전 시드니 지사에 계약서를 준비하라고 할게요

translation.en: Sounds great.
Right, Lola?
[smacking lips] Calder? A moment? Alone?
You just show up blindsiding me? Look, Audra's no Lola. Okay?
translation.ko: - 이렇게 나타나는 게 어딨어요? - 오드라는 네게 못 미쳐

translation.en: You hold things together at Mythos.
So I'll forgive that messy outburst you had when you quit.
translation.ko: 그러니 그때 난동 피운 것도 너그러이 용서해 주지

translation.en: A 20% pay bump comes with that promotion, plus bonuses.
translation.ko: 승진하면 연봉이 20%나 올라 보너스도 따로 있고

translation.en: Struggling is so pedestrian when you don't need to, Lola.
translation.ko: 왜 쉬운 길을 놔두고 굳이 어려운 길로 택해?

translation.en: Make it easy on yourself. Say yes.
I don't do easy.
Never have. The answer is no.
Everything good?
Actually, uh, Calder's mistaken. I won't be returning to Mythos,
translation.ko: 콜더가 오해한 모양이네요 전 미토스로 복직 안 합니다

translation.en: but I understand that you need to go with an established importer.
translation.ko: 그리고 좀 더 안정적인 업체를 원하시는 것도 이해합니다

translation.en: I'm disappointed you won't be on my team. Salud Imports is just too new.
translation.ko: 함께할 수 없다니 아쉽네요 살루드는 너무 신생이라서요

translation.en: [Lola] Sybylla Vaughn inspired me. You have a unique opportunity here
translation.ko: 기회를 주신다면 제가 시빌라 본에게 받은 영감을

translation.en: to have her inspire countless others around the world.
Parting gift. Best of luck to you.
Good luck to you too, Lola.
Hazel, uh, shall we go back and discuss strategy and scheduling?
translation.ko: 저희는 이만 돌아가서 전략과 일정을 마저 논의할까요?

translation.en: -Go ahead. I'll be right there. -[Calder] Okay.
You're doing the wrong thing, Haze.
I saw Lola at the winery yesterday. She's the person for the job.
translation.ko: 어제 양조장에서 롤라를 봤어야 해 롤라가 적임자야

translation.en: Well, now you suddenly care about Vaughn Family Wines?
translation.ko: 이제 와서 본 패밀리 와인에 관심이 생겼니?

translation.en: Wild guess, you decided to tell Lola who you are,

translation.en: and it was too late and blew up in your face.
Hate to say it, Brother, you should've stepped up sooner.
translation.ko: 이런 말 하긴 싫지만 좀 더 빨리 용기를 냈어야지

translation.en: In work and in love.
Are you insane? You walked away from everything you always wanted.
translation.ko: 미쳤어? 넌 방금 네가 원하던 모든 걸 내팽개쳤어

translation.en: You know, I've learned a lot about myself in Australia.
